abilities.name: Immaterial Flare
abilities.rule: While a friendly **THOUSAND SONS PSYKER** model is within 6" of this model, each time that model Channels the Warp, add 1 to the Psychic test result. This is not cumulative with any other modifiers to the Psychic test result.

abilities.name: Mutating Vortex
abilities.rule: At the end of your Movement phase, roll one D6 for each enemy unit within 6" of this model: on a 2-3, that unit suffers 1 mortal wound; on a 4-5, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 6, that unit suffers D6 mortal wounds. Each enemy unit within range of this ability must then take a Battle-shock test.
